reviews.review: good buy now

If the community wasnt so toxic this game would be cool.
But the devs decided to support toxic players cause they want to keep the game toxic.
Now we have an cool asymterical game 4vs1 where killers are totaly unsportsmanslike 90% of the time cause there also toxic players who play survivor and harass killers.
The disadvantage is clearly on the side of the normal people who happen to face an triggered or angry player.
9/10 games I have an killer or survivors who abuse the lamest mechanics to win.
Its not even fun anymore. Most killers just facecamp or wait in proxy of hook and wait for altruistic people.
And dont even try to use object of obession or they will insult u in after game chat no matter what.
Just had an legion going mad cause he couldnt get me down and left me 3 times in the whole match.
I was the last one left so thats the only reason why he got me in the end and he was so mad he called me names.

To keep it simple and to the point -

Buggy, repetitive, lazy devs that don't care anymore.
If you like grinding, you just MIGHT like this, but once you learn the ins and outs of the game (doesn't take long if you watch good content creators such as Otzdarva), the game is boring and every match is generally the same.

Game is unfun trash and the maps are all horribly balanced because the whole game is RNG. Please just don't play this or any other asymmetrical horror games for that matter.

For the around 192 hours of playtime on this game i have (as the time of me writing this) I have had an extraordinary experience with this game. This is one of the games that I yearn to play when watching gameplay on it. In my opinion, the pure mind game and the skill gap makes the game rewarding after winning. Besides obvious bugs (which i rarely experience), Dead By Daylight has been a great experience. I would never want to take back those 192 hours of life in any circumstance.
execelente monumento de juego, 100% recomendable

I've been playing DBD since it first came out and it has done nothing but improve on what was already there. Yes you will experience toxic players but that's the case in every online game, there will be bad apples. This is a great game to just log on and play by yourself but its even more fun when you're playing with a group of friends. If you've ever even considered getting it, DO IT, you wont regret your decision.
10/10 Game. Everything about it is fun

The game is fun but not without a wealth of complicated issues that can grind your gears. There are a number of balance issues and some decisions made based on top-tier play can hurt low-tier play. The biggest problem is the community of people that will play only one role and try to treat the other like absolute trash. Do yourself a favor and play both killer and survivor so you don't feel the need to treat every player that opposes you like garbage. But most of all, don't use Dwight in a Box.
epico juego

I've played this game much longer that just 96 hours, and I just keep on playing. If you win, you just wanna go again, and if you lose, you just wanna go again too. This game is the most addicting game I've ever played, and by far, my favorite multiplayer game.

As a Survivor, If you don't tie your enjoyment to the idea of getting out every time, I think you can have a lot of fun with this game.  As a Killer, expect that you will get stunned, survivors will hide from you the whole game, and you might not kill everyone every time, then you will also have fun.  This game is always one that I leave and come back to time and time again. I like seeing the new killers and survivors with all the added content. If you purchase this, don't get discouraged if you just get killed over and over, it's called Dead By Daylight for a reason.  The deck is stacked against you, but if you are careful or lucky, you can escape. The more you play, the better you will be.

It took me a while to decide on whether to recommend this game or not. I've spent a lot of hours into this game on both PS4 and PC and have had really good times and a lot of fun but also a lot of frustration and anger from the constant bugs and issues that the game has. Some bugs can be very game breaking from killers not being able to use their powers to not being able to rescue survivors from hooks. 

The game has certainly had its ups and downs over the years and sometimes the downs can be really bad from the inaction/ slow reaction from the developers of the game, not just on bugs but also balancing issues. Overall i do recommend this game if your are a fan of horror and asymmetrical games but do not go in expecting it to be perfect, its far from it.

this game is really fun but the one issue is that there are alot of bugs and the matchmaking is horrible

Dead By Daylight is a horror game in which you play in a team to repair generators while being chased by a killer to escape and live another day. This game has many different power-ups and unfair power-up decks, but it is still fun to play with friends. I would recommend this to anyone who likes games where you have to run from killers.
